function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for peak period movements and vehicle turnover frequency may lead to congestion and increased risk of disease transmission in the parking area","Impact":"Increased potential for disease spread due to crowded conditions and reduced ventilation in the parking area","Mitigation":"Incorporate traffic flow analysis and ventilation systems design to optimize the movement of vehicles and reduce congestion","Technologies":"Traffic flow modeling software, ventilation control systems","People":"Users of the off-street car parking, pedestrians in the vicinity","Owner":"Traffic engineers, urban planners, architects"},{"Description":"Inadequate pedestrian safety measures at entrance and exit points may lead to increased risk of accidents and potential exposure to contagious diseases","Impact":"Higher likelihood of accidents and pedestrian-vehicle conflicts, contributing to potential injury and disease spread","Mitigation":"Implement clear signage, dedicated pedestrian pathways, and traffic calming measures at entrance and exit points","Technologies":"Smart signage systems, pedestrian detection sensors, traffic calming infrastructure","People":"Pedestrians using the frontage roads, users of the off-street car parking","Owner":"Urban planners, traffic engineers, building designers"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and illumination in the car parking building may contribute to poor air quality and lack of visibility, posing potential health hazards and increased risk of disease transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory issues and reduced visibility, leading to potential accidents and disease spread","Mitigation":"Install adequate ventilation systems, energy-efficient lighting, and air quality monitoring to maintain a healthy environment","Technologies":"Energy-efficient LED lighting, air purification systems, air quality monitoring sensors","People":"Users of the car parking building, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building managers, facility management, architects"}]}
